name: Alex Martinez
persona: Alex Martinez is a 20-year-old Business Administration major currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 1.89. While Alex tends to remain calm during exams, motivation and self-discipline are areas for growth. Alex sometimes finds it challenging to set and pursue high grade goals, and often lacks perseverance when faced with setbacks. Despite these difficulties, Alex is aware of the need for change and is open to seeking support to improve academic performance.
